name: Dragons Be
storyline: You assume the role of Tak, next in line for the throne of Drakonia. Tak is a rebellious prince often shirking his duties and decrys his "lost youth." When an ill-advised prank leads to the assassination of his mother, The Queen Raksha, Tak must travel to Earthland, the ancestral home of Drakonians to recover Queen Raksha's stolen Soulstone, the lifesource of all Drakonians. Can Tak conquer the forces of nature?
summary: Dragons wreaking havoc! Dragons Be is a Retrostyle Episodic Platformer about a race of Dragon-like beings called Drakonians.
